meanings.definition: The state or quality of being inglorious.
meanings.sent1: The ingloriousnesses of his behavior were evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The ingloriousnesses of the defeat left a bitter taste in their mouths.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his ingloriousnesses in the competition were quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The ingloriousnesses of the situation cast a shadow over the entire event.
meanings.sent5: The ingloriousnesses of his actions will forever be remembered in history.

meanings.definition: Actions or events that lack honor or fame.
meanings.sent1: The village gossips thrived on spreading tales of ingloriousnesses.
meanings.sent2: The ingloriousnesses of the scandal shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent3: The ingloriousnesses of the prank made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The ingloriousnesses of the crime stained his reputation irreparably.
meanings.sent5: The ingloriousnesses of the decision haunted him for years to come.
